titleInfo.title: Attaches of the Elks' Opera House

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Printed on front of photograph: ''Attaches of the Elks' Opera House, Leadville, Colo., Seasons 1905-6-7-8, Wm. Crowell., Richard Orth., Eugene Hicks., Fred Mund., Joe Tagart, Stage Mgr., Edw. McGee., Chas. Walsh., Erwin Lockhart., Will Conley., C. H. Seymour., R. B. Ball., Geo. W. Casey, Mgr., Geo. S. Casey, Ass't Mgr., F. E. Randall, Treas., J. E. Ball., Wm. Fitzsimmons., Leonard Wes [cut off], Harold Hinckley., Geo. Bennett., Fred Kolbfell., John Andrew., Will Hinckley., David Schayer., Geo. Tobey.''

mods.abstract: Attaches from the 1905-1908 seasons of the Elks' Opera House in Leadville, Colorado pose with their managers in the lobby of the opera house. Back row left to right: ''William Crowell, Richard Orth, Eugene Hicks, Fred Mund, Joe Tagart, Stage Mgr., Edward McGee, and Charles Walsh. Center row left to right: Erwin Lockhart, Will Conley, C. H. Seymour, R. B. Ball, George W. Casey, Mgr., holding George S. Casey, Ass't Mgr., F. E. Randall, Treas., J. E. Ball, William Fitzsimmons, and Leonard Wes [name cut off]. Front row left to right: Harold Hinckley, George Bennett, Fred Kolbfell, John Andrew, Will Hinckley, David Schayer, and George Tobey.''
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
